mapper.select: select action.id actionId,action.action action,action.action_discribtion actionDiscribtion, map.role_id roleId, if(map.role_id is not null, true, false) selected from ( select * from admin_action where stat=1 ) action left join admin_role_action map on action.id = map.action_id and map.role_id=#{roleId} and map.stat = 1
